characterabilities.name: Bond of Brotherhood
characterabilities.description: This model can use Bond of Brotherhood once per game at any time during it's unit’s activation. For one round, when a model in this unit is damaged by an enemy attack while in formation, you can choose one or more models in this unit to suffer any amount of that damage instead, divided as you choose. A model cannot suffer more damage as a result of Bond of Brotherhood than it has unmarked damage boxes.
